properties.title: Doldenhornh√ºtte SAC
properties.description: Popular mountain hut on a rocky promontory above the village of Kandersteg, in original construction and traditional, simple, homely furnishings. Washroom outside the hut. Family-friendly alpine environment, famous for its diverse flora and impressive views of the Kandertal and, next to the hut, of the Oeschinensee. Combined alpine tours in summer and, if conditions are good, also in winter / spring.
